title: Sarabhai vs Sarabhai 1080p all episodes complete~ [bantu mistry]
description:
Sarabhai vs Sarabhai is my personal favourite comedy Tv Series! it is the most hilarious show i ever saw in my life! i consider it as the best Tv series of indian television!

Sarabhai vs Sarabhai is a 2004 sitcom featuring a quintessentially upper class "Gujarati" family in Mumbai. It was aired on channel STAR One in India. The show had one of the best TRPs for an Indian comedy show.
The show revolves around the life of a "Gujarati" family, the Sarabhais. They are portrayed as a typical family belonging to the class of elite socialites of Mumbai. They live in a luxurious apartment in Sarabhai mansion located in the upmarket Cuffe Parade area of South Mumbai. The family consists of Indravadan Sarabhai and his wife Maya, who live in an apartment with their younger son Rosesh. Their older son Sahil and his wife Manisha Sarabhai nee Singh live in the flat opposite. Maya considers the name Manisha middle class and renames her Monisha before their marriage. The middle class habits of Monisha irk Maya. Monisha, on the other hand, does not appreciate Maya's snooty and snobbish behaviour. Indravadan constantly derides Roshesh for being tied to his mother's apron strings and for writing bad poetry. Maya and Roshesh consider Indravadan's attitude towards Rosesh and his gregarious nature boorish. The ensuing conflict and comedy becomes 'Sarabhai Vs Sarabhai'. Much of the humour is derived from the fake, artificial and shallow interactions among the city's elite and their perceived notions of the shortcomings and failings of middle class society.
